Yus nh khạliq v mạlik chuh mvt vḥyatuk. Tmhi mokhh spz ath andr bdnyty hnz th bd aʿtqạdy hnz akh napạkyah th khbathtah pạdh, lhādha āvyithi ḥram krnh suh gvv, byyhi chuh ḥram suh janvr yus khdays vrạe byyhi kạnsih hndi navh thavnh yyhi, byyhi ys hvtt yyhi chyrnh, byyhi yus cznjhi sintụ̄ marnh āshi āmut, byyhi yus thzrh pytthh kvh pytthh ya kyris mnz vsụ̄ pyth mvmut āshi, byyhi yus janvr byyis janvrh snzi ttholhi sintụ̄ mvmut āshi, byyhi yus janvr drindn czapln khyvmut āshi, mgrhe yimv sarive janvrv andrh kạnshi janvrs amhi ṣdqh sintụ̄ mrnh brvntth zinde ạsith shrʿī dhbḥ krnh yyhi suh chuh ḥlal, byyhi chhi ḥram tim janvr yim dhbḥ yin krnh timn jayn yimn jayn khdays vrạe byyhi kạnshi hnz prstish krnh yivan āshi ya khdae sndi grh yʿny khanh kʿbs vrạe. Suh gvv ḥram, yhi chuh ḥram tvhụ̄ kyah kriv mushtrk janvr sund maz tqsym zarh kyv tyrv sintụ̄, yhi svrue chuh gnah najạyiz th ḥram yimv chyzv nishhi rvuziv pth, azkh dohh )yʿny 9 dhy alḥjthu alḥram 10h, ḥjth alvadʿ khi dohh yus ptim ḥj avs nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm yymhi pth qryb tryv rytv antqal pur mlal spud ḥẓrti pyghmbri aislam sund( spdụ̄ kạfr naaumyd tihndidyn khi mghlvb spdnh nishhi kyazi lchhhi bvd lvukh ạsụ̄ amhi dohh ḥạẓir ath ḥjs andr, ps mh khvucziv timn kạfrn. Qvts andr th aḥkam th qvạʿdn hndis pvur krns andr thi yymhi sintụ̄ kạfr mayvus spdi, byyhi krme amhi akmali dyn sintụ̄ pvur tohyhi pytth pnnụ̄ nʿmt. Lvukh chhi tohyhi prczhan kh shikar hvnyv th pạzh sndụ̄ rttụ̄ mtyv janvrv andrh kus kus janvr āv tuhndi khạṭr ḥlal krnh, tvhụ̄ frmạviyvkh ḥlal āe thavnh bdstvr tuhndi khạṭr yim sạriy ḥlal janvr yim hvnyn th pạzn hnd dhryʿh shikar krnh brvntth ḥlal krnh āmtụ̄ āsn. Hvnyn ya pạzn hndi shikar krnh sintụ̄ ya tihndis ạss mnz rttnh sintụ̄ pyyhi nh tihndis ḥlal āsns pytth kanhh athr, byyhi yim shikạrụ̄ janvr tvhụ̄ hychh nạviyvkh shikar krun tmhi ṭryqh yymhi ṭryqh tvhụ̄ Allah tʿālyā hn shryʿt khi dhryʿh hychh nạviv suh ṭryqh gvv yohe kh huvn hychh navun kh shikars rtthi mgr tmsndi mazh mnzh khyyhi nh pans akh rczh thi. Yithe pạtthụ̄ pyyhi pạzs tʿlym dinụ̄ kh hrgah ts vaps yinh khạṭr āvaz yyhi dinh fvraan yyhi vaps suh he adh shikars pth dvran āshi, amhi qsmkụ̄ shikạrụ̄ janvr yus shikarah tuhndi khạṭr rttith ann, ps khyyiv tvhụ̄ tmhi mnzh, byyhi ạsiv tim hvunụ̄ ya pạz shikars pytth travnkhi vqth khdae sund nav hyvan yʿny bsm Allah prith ạsiyvkh travan. Byyhi vatnavn tim suh shikar tohyhi brvntth kun, byyhi ạsiv sarne kamyn andr Allah tʿālyā hs khvczan. Shikar krns mnz mh ạsiv tmhi qsmh mshghvl spdan kh nmaz ya byyv frạyẓv nishhi spdiv ghạfil. Ya shikar ḥlal spdnh kyo yimv czvrv shrṭv andrh kunhi shrṭs mnz kriv phlv thy, byshk Allah tʿālyā chuh jld ḥisab hyvh vun yymhi pth suh sarne jza th sza diyhi. Lhādha gczihh ts khvczun.

Azkh dohh yithh pạtthụ̄ dyny, abdy akh anʿāmh sintụ̄ tvhụ̄ mushrf spdiv, yithe pạtthụ̄ āv tohyhi akh dnyạviy anʿāmah thi ʿṭa krnh suh gvv yhi kh az āe ḥlal krnh tuhndi khạṭr rtụ̄ th pak chyz hmyshh khạṭr yim nh zanhh thi āyindh ḥram spdn, byyhi chuh tuhndi khạṭr ḥlal timn lvukn hndi athh khsh krnh āmut janvr ya tihndi athh rnnh āmut ghdha yimn ktab āyhi ʿṭa krnh yʿny yhvd vnṣaryā. Alḥạṣil ktaby znanhi sintụ̄ nkaḥ krun chuh shryʿt aslamy ys andrjạyiz, mushrik znanhi sintụ̄ chuhnh jạyiz tmhi khạṭr chuh ṣryḥ ḥkum mmanʿtuk qrāni mjyds mnz mvjvd, mushrik znann sintụ̄ mh kriv nikaḥ yvtanụ̄ nh timh ayman ann. Lhādha tuhndi mdhhbuk ḥkum ya tihnzn znann hund ḥkum chuhnh ahli ktabn hund hiyvḥkum. Khyvn chvn be ẓrvrt aikhtlaṭ krun, tihnzn znann hndis zals andr lgun, yimn chyzn hund yus ntyjh nyran chuh tmich chhe sarne pvur khbr. Lhādha chuh bdy nishhi bd dyny hndyv asbabv vdhrayʿū nishhi aijtnab krun th lvb rvzun lạzim, byyhi nh yarz lạgith pvshydh pạtthụ̄ ychh kạm kr vnụ̄, byyhi yus akhah shryʿt kyn ḥukmn ankar kri yʿny ḥlal qṭʿī zanhi ḥram ḥram qṭʿī zanhi ḥlal humhi kis ḥlal āsns th yymhi kis ḥram āsns kri ainkar.
